title: How We Got Here #6: The Origins of the Culture War (The RIse of Propaganda)
description:
Well, after over a year here it is! How We Got Here #6: The Origins of the Culture War. I have tried to be as fair as possible. But there is no way to please everybody in these things. And I'm sure there will be people who will question what I say. But that's why this is so long. I needed to prove my points. You need to see and hear evidence to weigh it. And even then much more is needed. I am interested in history, not in confirming presuppositions. Though someone may say that I certainly have my own presuppositions. True enough. But again I have tried to be fair... according to what I see. And having listened to many voices from many other perspectives for many years.This is a dialogue. So reply. Respectfully please. 

(Special thanks to David Hoffman.)

''''''''

From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream
Byrne
#jesuspeople #culturewar #history
